statements.select: select * from InvoiceXT where invoicedate between #startTime# and #endTime#
statements.update: update dbo.InvoiceXT set InvoiceOwed = InvoiceOwed + #InvoiceOwed# where InvoiceId = #InvoiceId#
update dbo.InvoiceXT set InvoiceOwed = InvoiceOwed - #InvoiceOwed# where InvoiceId = #InvoiceId#
statements.select: select * from InvoiceXT where InvoiceDate between #startDate# and #endDate# and (CustomerId=#CustomerId# or #CustomerId# is null) and InvoiceId in (select InvoiceId from InvoiceXTDetail where InvoiceXOId in (select InvoiceId from InvoiceXO where CustomerInvoiceXOId=#CustomerInvoiceXOId# or #CustomerInvoiceXOId# is null))
